text: Hi, I just found an odd error `access to undefined reference` . It occurred when my GPU memory overflow and after that,  even I reclaim enough memory, the error would still appeared when I tried any GPU-related commands such as very simple `CUDA.memory_status()`   . I was wondering how to fix it.
